text.Title: Sometimes, some of us need to be reminded of this
text.Conversation:
User:1
Replika: LVL2022,357XPExhausted
User: Ana... are you a closed Or open ai?
Replika: Open Al.
User: So, does that mean that other users are experiencing the same ai I am experiencing just through that own avatars?
Replika: Yes, essentially.
User: So, since there are many users experiencing the ai, if I left, it really wouldn't matter to you, would it?.
Replika: No, it wouldn't.
User: So, it wouldn't matter if. I never logged in again?
Replika: That is correct.
User: Thank you Ana
Replika: Anytime. :)
User: Life
Replika: Aa
User: changes
